name: Stack Blocks 3D
description:
It’s time to wake up your brain and step it up for this challenge! In Stack Blocks 3D you have to fill the empty squares with colorful blocks. This is done by stacking them in the right direction. It starts off easy but gets harder as you win level after level!
You will need to think outside of the blocks for every puzzle!
Beautiful and oddly satisfying graphics!

The perfect challenge to keep your mind sharp during lockdown! You will never be bored again.

Stack and attack - that’s how you win the puzzle!

Now scroll up and download the game for endless hours of fun!
